org.deeplearning4j.nn.updater

Class LayerUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.updater.BaseMultiLayerUpdater<Layer>
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.updater.LayerUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Updater

    public class LayerUpdater
extends BaseMultiLayerUpdater<Layer>
    Updater for a single layer, excluding MultiLayerNetwork (which also implements the Layer interface)
    See Also:

      • getOrderedLayers

        protected Trainable[] getOrderedLayers()
        Specified by:
        getOrderedLayers in class BaseMultiLayerUpdater<Layer>
        Returns:
        Array of layers, in the correct order (i.e., same order as the parameter/gradient/updater flattening order - input to output for MultiLayerNetwork, or topological order for ComputationGraph)

        protected boolean isMiniBatch()
        Specified by:
        isMiniBatch in class BaseMultiLayerUpdater<Layer>
